name: Growing Pains (itch) (viewersessions)
description:
This is the first game I've ever made. I normally make music, but really like video games.

I am making this for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2023 event. 

My goals:

1. Have movement

2. Have a shoot mechanic

3. Make the art and music myself (no stock stuff)

4. Have a beginning, middle, and end.

5. Have two different endings.

Not perfect, but for two weeks it's a start!

There are bugs I'm aware of, regarding music and sprite animations.

Controls

A/D - Move left and right

Space - Jump

Enter - Shoot

R - Retry Level
